entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Oxbow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -7.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
